description:
Larkin Home Health Services, Inc., believes in the healing benefits a patient receives while being treated in the comfort of their own home. Most patients who meet the criteria for home care can be treated cost-effectively while achieving psychological and sociological benefits of in-home treatments.

Services include: 

* Registered Licensed Nurses Hi-Tech
* IV Therapy
* Infusion Wound Care Management Post-Operative Care
* Safety Measures Teaching and Instructions on Medication
* Physical, Occupational, & Speech Therapy
* Registered Clinical Social Worker
* Home Health Aide for Personal Care
name: LARKIN HOME HEALTH SERVICES, INC.
